section.title: Unable to power on virtual machine on VMware

formalpara.title: Symptom
formalpara.para: Virtual machine does not power on. You might see errors like:

listitem.para: Unable to access a file since it is locked
ïƒ˜ Unable to access Virtual machine configuration

formalpara.title: Cause
formalpara.para: A known issue on VMware machines. ESX hosts lock certain critical virtual machine files and file systems to prevent concurrent changes. Sometimes the files are not unlocked when the virtual machine is powered off. When a virtual machine attempts to power on, it can not access these critical files, and the virtual machine is unable to power on.
